author: Brochmand, Jesper Rasmussen, 1585-1652
title: De fide justificante disputatio opposita Pontificiis, Socinianis, Calvinianis. Arminianis, Anabaptistis, Svenckfeldianis, Veigelianis quam ... pr¾side Casparo Erasm. Brochmand ... tueri ad diem 20. Julii adlaborabit pro stipendio regio impetrando, Johanne
